settings.what_you_need: 35ml Grind House Blend (3x pods on espresso pour)

settings.step_descriptions: Add the vodka and Tia Maria to a large glass cup.
Pull a fresh shot of espresso straight into the mix.
Add a dash of cold milk, and mix everything together.
Steam the remaining milk until it’s hot and finish with latte art (tag us in your best efforts with @grind).

settings.title: Hot Flat White Russian
settings.text: Not to brag, but this is a little cocktail we designed back in 2011 at our flagship cafe-bar in Shoreditch. We’ve been around the block a few times since then, and drunk plenty of coffee cocktails but our Hot Flat White Russian has stood the test of time.
settings.final_touch_content:
Enjoy your Grind coffee black or with milk.
We recommend the Grind Milk Frother, if you’re using milk for the perfect coffee.
